actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Mormon Trail, located in portions of Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska, Wyoming, and Utah as a component of the National Trails System.
short_title: Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail Act

summary.text: Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to establish the Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail, located in portions of Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska, Wyoming, and Utah as a component of the National Trails System.

titles.title: Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail Act
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Mormon Trail, located in portions of Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska, Wyoming, and Utah as a component of the National Trails System.
